item.description:
I chose Fire & Ice for March as it is fairly centrally located in Providence Place Mall. They are a really ecclectic place with a lot of variety. You pick your food items, then they cook it on this huge central grill- it's really neat! I was told breakfast style items are served from 10-12 then lunch style items become available around noon. Brunch is $13.95 all you can eat, drinks are an additional charge.

I am making a reservation for 10 people, so that will be the maximum number of people to RSVP. In addition, I am eliminating maybe responses in order to allow those who really want to attend to get a spot. If this event fills up, please RSVP "No" with a comment to be wait listed.

In order to help defray the cost of hosting a group on meetup, I would like to ask all members who attend meetups to contribute a dollar at alternating events. There will be no real tracking of this, but it would just be a good will donation to help me out. Thanks all!

I think this is going to be fun and I look forward to meeting everyone. Yay brunch!
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the one in the picture with the red hair :-)
item.why: You will get good food and great conversation with people who have similar interests(well at least in brunch anyway)...
item.name: Rhode Island Brunch Bunch! March Meeting- Fire & Ice
